str2: Even as, just as. From katha and per; exactly as.

parse: Verb - Perfect Indicative Active - 2nd Person Plural

str2: Probably adverb of comparative from hos; which how, i.e. In that manner.
Each (of more than two), every one. As if a superlative of hekas; each or every.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Genitive 2nd Person Plural
str2: You. The person pronoun of the second person singular; thou.
Probably adverb of comparative from hos; which how, i.e. In that manner.
Father, (Heavenly) Father, ancestor, elder, senior. Apparently a primary word; a 'father'.

parse: Reflexive Pronoun - Genitive Masculine 3rd Person Singular

str2: A child, descendent, inhabitant. From the base of timoria; a child.
